laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Feces test for C. difficile toxin A & B
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).
Gallbladder distended (6.1 cm), new wall thickening, stable thick-walled fluid and gas collection (3.7 x 3.6 cm), recurrent fluid and gas collection (4.7 x 3.5 cm).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall thickening is new compared to prior exam; stable size of collection in splenectomy bed (previously 3.8 x 3.8 cm).
